jobDescription: Robert Half Technology is seeking a Power BI Analyst to join a thriving customer centric organization in San Diego. Our client, a well-known and respected leader in the local industry is working to implement Power BI to integrate with their new SQL Data Warehouse. They have been migrating off of Business Objects and will need help redefining their financial reporting, cost analysis and variance analysis. The ideal candidate will have a history of experience working with financial data, an understanding of cost analysis, forecasting, etc. and strong knowledge in building reports in Power BI. While this role will work relatively independently on the project itself there will be significant input and help from the Director of Finance and the IT department. Technical exposure should include Power BI experience and the ability to extract data from a SQL database or Data Warehouse. Currently there are roughly 10 critical financial reports coming via Business Objects that must be recreated prior to budgeting season in late Q3/Q4, beyond this there are several less critical and infrequently used reports that will need to be recreated as time passes. In addition, strong communication skills and technical documentation will be critical to the success of the role.  For immediate consideration for this position please contact Mark Ecal @ 858-812-0581  Please send resumes to mark.ecal@rht.com  I can also be reached via LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/markecal/
